policies.description: Provides direct financial assistance to small and marginal farmers and landless agriculture households in Odisha.
benefits: Direct cash transfer to eligible farmers’ bank accounts
Subsidies for agricultural inputs (seeds, fertilizers, pesticides)
eligibility: Odisha resident small and marginal farmers
policies.application: Register via the CM Kisan portal or Odisha agriculture department channels

policies.description: Krushak Assistance for Livelihood and Income Augmentation (KALIA) provides financial and risk mitigation support to cultivators and vulnerable agricultural households.
benefits: Financial assistance per season for small & marginal farmers
Interest-free crop loans
Life insurance cover for farmers and landless agriculture laborers
policies.application: Scheme enrollment through agriculture department registration systems

policies.description: Provides direct subsidy for purchasing farm implements and machinery to improve productivity and reduce drudgery.
benefits: Direct Benefit Transfer subsidy for implements like tillers, harvesters, etc.
Assistance for farm mechanisation investments
eligibility: Priority to small and marginal farmers
policies.application: Apply via DBT farm implements portal or agriculture extension offices

policies.description: Subsidy scheme to promote agro-based industries and value addition enterprises in the state.
benefits: Capital subsidies for agro-business units
Support for food processing and allied enterprises
eligibility: FPOs and agricultural entities expanding processing capacity
policies.application: Submit project proposal to Odisha agriculture or industry departments

policies.description: Provides minimum assured procurement of paddy at fixed support price plus state bonus, improving farmers’ income security.
benefits: State-assured procurement price for paddy
Electronic weighing and prompt payment within 48 hours
eligibility: Must sell paddy through authorized procurement centers
policies.application: Register with procurement system and mandi registration required

policies.description: Financial assistance for farmers to install solar photovoltaic irrigation pumps, reducing dependence on grid electricity and diesel.
benefits: Subsidy support to make solar pump affordable
Increases irrigation potential in off-grid areas
eligibility: Priority for remote areas with poor electricity supply
policies.application: Register through Odisha Renewable Energy or agriculture extension schemes

policies.description: Encourages the formation and strengthening of Farmer Producer Organisations with technical and financial assistance.
benefits: Assistance to register and run FPOs
Support in marketing and capacity building
eligibility: Farmer groups and cooperatives in Odisha
FPOs aligned with agriculture development goals
policies.application: Apply through Odisha agriculture department FPO portals

policies.description: Assists farmers through watershed creation and soil conservation works to improve moisture retention and combat erosion.
benefits: Technical and financial support for soil and water conservation
Creation of check dams, contour trenches, and farm bunds
policies.application: Engage through district watershed committees and agriculture offices

policies.description: Support to farmers for rearing livestock, poultry and related units, including broiler and layer farming subsidies.
benefits: Subsidies for broiler and layer poultry units
Support for livestock enhancement activities
eligibility: Priority to small farmers and women self-help groups
policies.application: Apply through Odisha livestock or agriculture departments

policies.display_name: Odisha Interest Subsidy and Agricultural Loan Support
policies.description: Provides interest subsidy on crop loans up to a defined limit for farmers, making borrowing more affordable. This may include zero-interest loans up to defined amounts.
benefits: Interest subsidy on agricultural loans
Affordable credit up to set limits
eligibility: Farmers taking loans from cooperative banks or PACS
policies.application: Avail loans from approved banks with subsidy application
